EmailTemplate.name: Webcast - Whitepaper Offer New
EmailTemplate.subject: 46% Of VDI Projects Stall, Donâ€™t Let Yours Be One Of Them
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{Lead.First Name}}, <http://vmturbo.com/wp-vdi-performance?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=wcast_stencil_love&utm_content=wp_offer> Did you know that 46% of VDI projects stall? Its a daunting number that we want to decrease, and this paper is designed to do just that. Download this paper <http://vmturbo.com/wp-vdi-performance?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=wcast_stencil_love&utm_content=wp_offer> and join the discussion on how to prevent VDI performance degradation and budget over runs in a VDI deployment. The two main VDI project killers. In this paper you will learn how to:
- Manage extreme storage I/O demand, the biggest challenge facing performance assurance in a VDI environment - Quickly place new desktop workloads factoring in real-time resource allocation and continuous changes in the underlying infrastructure - Assure end-users receive a desktop like experience by minimizing latency and leveraging your existing hardware - Prevent I/O intensive tasks (e.g. patch updates, antivirus updates, reboots) from overtaxing your storage footprint - Assure VDI performance of your environment while maximizing utilization
<http://vmturbo.com/wp-vdi-performance?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=wcast_stencil_love&utm_content=wp_offer>
- The VMTurbo Team
